text: The 2019–20 Club Puebla season is the 73rd season in the football club's history and the 12th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. The club this season will compete in the Apertura and Clausura tournaments as well as in the Copa MX. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
